channel.title: How do i change the place of an item?
channel.description:
i have added a custom to the class8 of the client the item is a platebody and spawned it and it worked then it goes to the weapon part.
so how do i chnage it to the platebody part
also can u give me the list like eg
helm = 1 platebody =3 cape =2
thats an example thanks

item.title: How do i change the place of an item?
item.dc:creator: @noobspure50 noobspure50
item.description:
@noobspure50 wrote:

item.java

public static int body[] add the item id in with that,
also for boots, helms, capes, ect, just go there gl

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the place of an item?
